news_title: A Kashmir Solution
event: And there is anxiety as no one is sure about the BJP intention to adopt a political approach towards the turmoil in Kashmir and work towards a political resolution.

event: And understandably so.

news_title: A Kashmir Solution
event: But the truth is even if the centre to a significant extent achieves the centre's ambitious security objectives in the Valley within a specific timeframe, it would make little redeeming difference to the state of affairs.

news_title: Donald Trump And The Strangling Of Persia
event: The key themes that shaped Iran's modern history and informed Iran's political culture broadly overlap with the experiences of other developing societies in the global south.In his magisterial study, From the Ruins of Empire, his reminds us that Western history is not universal history.

event: At the start of his magisterial study, From the Ruins of Empire, his observes that for most of the developing world, the key events of the 20th century were not the two world wars, the Holocaust, the Cold War or the fall of the Berlin Wall.

news_title: Donald Trump And The Strangling Of Persia
event: The central political developments that shaped the modern history and identity of millions of Asians and Africans revolved around the struggle for self-determination and independence from Europe.Iran's story fits within this framework.

news_title: Donald Trump And The Strangling Of Persia
event: While Iran was never formally colonised, historians have described 19th-century Iran as a "semi-colony" due to the conspicuous influence Western powers had over Iran's domestic affairs.

news_title: Donald Trump And The Strangling Of Persia
event: In 1872, for example, Baron Julius de Reuter - of news agency fame - received a concession from the corrupt Qajar king for control over all railway construction, mineral extraction, irrigation networks, creation of a national bank, and all other agricultural and industrial projects - in return for a modest sum of money.Lord Curzon, British foreign minister, later described a concession as "the most complete and extraordinary surrender of the entire industrial resources of a kingdom into foreign hands that had probably ever been dreamt of.

news_title: Donald Trump And The Strangling Of Persia
event: "Around the same time, Britain obtained control over the production, sale and export of Iranian tobacco.

news_title: Donald Trump And The Strangling Of Persia

event: The objective was to end royal absolutism by transforming Iran into a constitutional monarchy, establishing a parliament and institutionalising the rule of law.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: It is neither to be guided by a sense of sentimentality nor to be governed by prejudices,” a bench of Justice Ali Mohammad Magrey said, adding, “Acts or activities of individual or a group of individuals, prejudicial to the security of the State, have magnitude of across-the-board disfigurement of societies.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: No court should tune out such activities, being swayed by passion of mercy.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: It is an obligation of the Court to constantly remind the Court the right of society is never maltreated or marginalised by doings, an individual or set of individuals propagate and carry out.”The court said it is apt to mention here that if one looks at the acts, the J&K Public Safety Act, 1978, is designed for, is to prevent, the acts, the J&K Public Safety Act, 1978 are all these acts that are prejudicial to security of the State or maintenance of public order.“The acts, indulged in by persons, who act in concert with other persons and quite often such activity has national level consequences.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: These acts are preceded by a good amount of planning and organisation by the set of people fascinated in tumultuousness,” a bench of Justice Ali Mohammad Magrey said, adding, “These acts are not like ordinary law and order crimes.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: If, however, in any given case a single act is found to be not sufficient to sustain the order of detention a single act may well be quashed, but it cannot be stated as a principle that one single act cannot constitute the basis for detention.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: On the contrary, one single act does.

news_title: HC Rejects JeI Chief’s Plea Against PSA Detention
event: In other words, it is not necessary that there should be multiplicity of grounds for making or sustaining an order of detention.”

news_title: ACB Books Ex-Chairman J&K Bank For Insurance Fraud
event: In statement issued here, The Anti-Corruption Bureau  said that The Anti-Corruption Bureau's source report revealed that a insurance deal in violation of norms has been made by J&K  Bank with one company namely, IFFCO TOKIO in which his close relative J&K  Bank is employed resulting into undue benefits to one company namely, IFFCO TOKIO in which close relative of former chairman J&K Bank Parvez Ahmed Nengroo is employed.

news_title: ACB Books Ex-Chairman J&K Bank For Insurance Fraud
event: “A verification conducted into the matter revealed that J&K  Bank had already entered into venture with PNB Metflife Insurance company for sale of PNB Metflife Insurance company's insurance products in the year 2000, followed by similar nature of venture with Bajaj Allianz Insurance Company for sale and distribution of Bajaj Allianz Insurance Company's non life insurance products including health product in the year 2002.” A verification conducted into the matter the matter revealed that due to a insurance deal in violation of norms, The Anti-Corruption Bureau said, his close relative has been conferred business of insurance in SRINAGAR and Anantnag at the cost of bank resources and that of Bajaj Allianz company Ltd which was already in arrangement with J&K  Bank since 2002.“The initial probe further revealed that in the first quarter of financial year 2018-2019,i.e, April to June, J&K  Bank received commission from Bajaj Allianz Insurance Company to the tune of Rs 159 lacs, whereas commission received from IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd for the first quarter of current financial year is to the tune of Rs 88 lacs only which is less by Rs 71 lacs, thereby a loss in the form of commission to J&K  Bank has been caused.”The ACB said by resorting to the acts of favoritism and abuse of official position as J&K  Bank in connivance with IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd, his close relative was appointed in one company namely, IFFCO TOKIO in which close relative of former chairman J&K Bank Parvez Ahmed Nengroo is employed against annual salary package of Rs 19,28,886 which is approximately 2.5 times higher than that of the package given by Bajaj Allianz General Insurance Company where his close relative was functioning as deputy manager.

news_title: ACB Books Ex-Chairman J&K Bank For Insurance Fraud
event: “It is pertinent to mention here that his close relative is serving as Chief Manager in IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd SRINAGAR office.

news_title: ACB Books Ex-Chairman J&K Bank For Insurance Fraud
event: In order to effect search of the office premises of IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd located at Chinar Complex Residency Road SRINAGAR Kashmir, a warrant was procured from the competent court of law.

news_title: ACB Books Ex-Chairman J&K Bank For Insurance Fraud
event: search of the office premises of IFFCO TOKIO General Insurance Company located at Chinar Complex Residency Road Srinagar Kashmir was conducted to seize incriminatory evidence related to the commission of the offence by the officers/officials of IFFCO TOKIO General Insurance Company Ltd.”The omissions and commissions on the part of Parvez Ahmed Nengroo, the then Chairman J&K Bank Ltd in furtherance of conspiracy hatched with Officer/officials of IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd while executing an insurance deal with IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd in order to secure appointment of Parvez Ahmed Nengroo, the then Chairman J&K Bank Ltd's  close relative Asif Manzoor Beigh in IFFCO TOKIO General insurance Company Ltd and others at the cost of J&K  Bank resources constitute criminal misconduct under J&K P C Act 2006 and thus disclose commission of offences punishable U/S 5(1) (d) read with 5(2) J&K Prevention of Corruption Act and section 120B of the RPC, The Anti-Corruption Bureau said.

news_title: ACB Books Ex-Chairman J&K Bank For Insurance Fraud
event: “Case FIR No 14/2019 stands registered in The Anti-Corruption Bureau into the matter and investigation is going on.”

news_title: India Rejects Trumps Mediation Claim
event: NEW DELHI — The Indian government has denied US President Donald Trump's astonishing claim that Prime Minister Narendra Modi had asked US President Donald Trump's to mediate on Kashmir.

news_title: India Rejects Trumps Mediation Claim
event: "We have seen @POTUS's remarks to the press that US President Donald Trump's is ready to mediate, if requested by The Indian government & Pakistan, on Kashmir.

news_title: India Rejects Trumps Mediation Claim
event: No such request has been made by Prime Minister Narendra Modi to US President Donald Trump's," Ministry of External Affairs spokesman Raveesh Kumar tweeted.

news_title: India Rejects Trumps Mediation Claim
event: "It has been The Indian government's consistent position that all outstanding issues with Pakistan are discussed only bilaterally.

news_title: India Rejects Trumps Mediation Claim
event: Any engagement with Pakistan would require an end to cross border terrorism.

news_title: India Rejects Trumps Mediation Claim

event: If US President Donald Trump's can do anything to help, let US President Donald Trump's know," US President Donald Trump's said in response to a question.US President Donald Trump's said that US President Donald Trump's is ready to help, if India & Pakistan ask for help.

news_title: India Launches Chandrayaan-2 To Moon
event: "Chandrayaan-2 is unique because The mission's will explore and perform studies on the south pole region of lunar terrain which is not explored and sampled by any past mission.

news_title: India Launches Chandrayaan-2 To Moon
event: The mission's will offer new knowledge about the moon," Prime Minister Narendra Modi said in a congratulatory tweet.Scientists led by ISRO chief K. Sivan watched the launch sequence in rapt attention and broke into applause after every key stage of its powerful rocket GSLV MkIII M1 flight which progressed precisely as programmed.A visibly relieved Sivan, who announced the success of The mission's, said, "the success of the mission is the beginning of a historical journey of India towards the moon.

news_title: India Launches Chandrayaan-2 To Moon
event: "After that the D-Day will come and on the D-Day we are going to experience 15 minutes of terror, to ensure landing is safely near the unchartered south pole of the celestial body," A visibly relieved Sivan, who announced the success of the mission added.Read: How will The mission's launch work?

news_title: India Launches Chandrayaan-2 To Moon
event: "Chandrayaan-2 is the next leap in technology as us attempt to soft land close to the unchartered south pole of the celestial body.

news_title: India Launches Chandrayaan-2 To Moon
event: landing is extremely complex and us will experience approximately 15 minutes of terror," the ISRO chief had said.The mission'sthe United States , seeks to improve understanding of the moon which could lead to discoveries that will benefit India and humanity as a whole.A Laser Retroreflector Array (LRA) of US space agency NASA is among a total of 13 payloads, including three from the Europe, two from the US and one Bulgaria and is aimed at understanding dynamics of Earths moon system and deriving clues on Lunar interior.According to ISRO, the unchartered south pole of the celestial body is an interesting surface area which remains in shadow than North Pole.There is a possibility of the presence of water in permanently shadowed areas around the unchartered south pole of the celestial body, ISRO said, adding craters in the South Pole region have cold traps and contain fossil record of the early solar system.a roverrover Pragyan, will be landed in a high plain between two craters at a latitude of about 70 degrees South of the moon.Then the 27-kg Pragyan meaning wisdom in Sanskrit and a six-wheeled robotic vehicle, will set out on a six-wheeled robotic vehicle's job of collecting information on the lunar surface.A safe site free of hazards for landing would be decided based on pictures sent back by the camera onboard a rover and after touchdown a six-wheeled robotic vehicle will carry out experiments for 14 Earth days, equals one Lunar Day.a textbook launch was witnessed by nearly 5,000 people who were accommodated at a viewing gallery, located a few kms from the launchpad, thrown open to the public by ISRO in May last.

event: “We were literally in hell and We cannot believe We are free now,” Mirza Nisar Hussain son of Mirza Ali Muhammad, a resident of Namchabal, Fateh Kadal said.Echoing the Latif Ahmed Baja claim Mirza Nisar Hussain son of Mirza Ali Muhammad, a resident of Namchabal, Fateh Kadal also says the jail inmates hate the Muslims so much that the jail inmates don’t want to see the Muslims anywhere.“And when you are a Kashmiri and that too a Muslim, one can imagine the height of hatred,” Mirza Nisar Hussain son of Mirza Ali Muhammad, a resident of Namchabal, Fateh Kadal said.Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, SRINAGAR, lost Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar's parents while Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar was in jail.

news_title: Feel Like Reborn: 3 Wrongfully Jailed Kashmiris Walk Free After 23 Years
event: Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar's other brother Iftikhar Ali Mirza was also in New Delhi’s Tihar jail and was released after 14-years, in the year 2010.“I was arrested in 1996 and was lodged in New Delhi’s Tihar jail till 2014 and then shifted to Jaipur Jail where His other brother Iftikhar Ali Mirza was lodged till last week,” Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar says.“It’s better to die than spend life in jails but God gave We strength and We were hopeful that We will be out of bars one day.Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar said that Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar had thought that Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar would meet Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar's family after Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar's release but “all have died, Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar's father, mother, and sister are no more,” Muhammad Ali Bhat son of Sher Ali Bhat, a resident of Hassanabad, Srinagar said with moist eyes.

news_title: Local Militant Recruitment Declines By 40%: GoI
event: (Militant) initiated incidents have declined by 28%.

news_title: Local Militant Recruitment Declines By 40%: GoI
event: Actions initiated by the security forces witnessed an increase of 59% and have resulted in 22% increase in neutralization of (militants),” said G. Kishan Reddy informed the Rajya Sabha, responding to a question by a member Sanjay Singh, seeking the details of increase in militancy in the Jammu and Kashmir Kashmir during last three years; the steps taken by Government to tackle militancy; the results of the steps taken by Government to tackle militancy; and future plans to control militancy in the Jammu and Kashmir.“The Government has adopted a policy of zero tolerance towards (militancy) and has taken various measures, such as strengthening of security apparatus, strict enforcement of law against anti-national --elements, intensified cordon and search operations to effectively deal with the challenges posed by the (militant) organisations.”Government Forces, G. Kishan Reddy said, keep a close watch on persons who attempt to provide support to militants and initiate action against militants.“In order to bring about overall development for the benefit of people of the Jammu and KashmirKashmir, Prime Minister has announced a package of Rs.80,068 crores,” G. Kishan Reddy said.a package of Rs.80,068 crores consists of 63 major development projects in Road sector, Power generation and transmission, health infrastructure, establishment of 2 AIIMS, IITs, IIMs and tourism related projects etc, G. Kishan Reddy added.“Training and employment opportunities for the youth of the Jammu and Kashmir Kashmir are also provided under many schemes such as HIMAYAT and PMKVY,” G. Kishan Reddy said, adding, “In order to mainstream the youth, special emphasis is being given to Watan Ko Jano program, student exchange program, sports as well as civic action program of CAPFs.”

news_title: Pompeo Steers Clear Of K-Word
event: WASHINGTON — After the diplomatic brouhaha over President Donald Trump's off-the-cuff remarks on Kashmir, which invited an immediate denial from an upset India, the US was careful not to mention the 'K' word during a subsequent meeting between US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and visiting Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan.US Secretary of State Mike Pompeovisiting Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan , stressed that the US looked forward to "continued progress from Pakistan on shared security priorities, including defeating terrorist organisations, which US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo hoped would form the basis of a reinvigorated partnership".US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo emphasised on the "continued importance of the US and Pakistan working together to advance shared priorities, including Pakistan's significant role in supporting the Afghan peace process and counter-terrorism".US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo welcomed the occasion to discuss opportunities for enhanced cooperation, including expanded trade and investment opportunities, said a readout by spokesperson Morgan Ortagus.The President Donald Trump's administration is banking heavily on Pakistan to resolve the Afghan issue and had invited Islamabad for talks with the Taliban.During President Donald Trump's's media interaction along with visiting Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan, President Donald Trump's had said: "President Donald Trump's think Pakistan is going to help us out to extricate us.

news_title: Plan Announced To Upgrage Anganwadi Centres
event: Model Anganwadi Centres with upgraded infrastructure and improved amenities like toilets, drinking water and hygiene will be then replicated at other Anganwadi Centres in the State to change the face of the Government's 44-year-old children and women-oriented program for efficient delivery of Integrated Child Development Scheme.

news_title: Plan Announced To Upgrage Anganwadi Centres
event: Under Integrated Child Development Scheme, supplementary nutrition is provided to children in the age group of 0-6 years and to pregnant/lactating mothers with main objective to fight the problem of malnutrition.

news_title: Plan Announced To Upgrage Anganwadi Centres
event: Under ‘Decentralized Policy for Procurement of Supplementary Nutrition’, supplementary nutrition shall be procured at Halqa Panchayat/Municipal Ward level through Panchayats and Municipal Committees.

news_title: Plan Announced To Upgrage Anganwadi Centres
event: “The procurement of nutrition items will have to be strictly as per the menu displayed in the Anganwadi Centres and to be procured from Super Bazaar/Cooperative Stores/Fixed Price Shops/Registered Local Shopkeepers on the rates not exceeding the rates notified by FCS&CA,” Principal Secretary, Social Welfare Department, Rohit Kansal maintained adding that ‘Decentralized Policy for Procurement of Supplementary Nutrition’ has been framed as per the delegation of powers to the Panchayati Raj Institutions under the amended Panchayati Raj Act.

news_title: Plan Announced To Upgrage Anganwadi Centres
event: To expedite implementation of ‘Decentralized Policy for Procurement of Supplementary Nutrition’, Principal Secretary, Social Welfare Department, Rohit Kansal directed that the Procurement Committees should be in place in all the 4483 Panchayats in the State by the end of this month followed by opening of dedicated bank accounts in each Panchayat for the purpose.

news_title: Plan Announced To Upgrage Anganwadi Centres

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: Executive Engineer, Public Health Engineering Water Works Division Srinagar has appealed the general public to use water judiciously.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: "The consumers using direct online boosters are appealed to stop this practice immediately for equal distribution of water supply in the area.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: this practice is an offence under Jammu & Kashmir State Water Resources Regulation and Management Act 2010 and the Department shall be forced to take action against all such offenders," he said.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: he also urged the people to contact the Control Room in case the people find any violation of the water resources.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: A day before, one more report on the shortage of water in south Kashmir’s Kokernag area laid bare the grim reality.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: As one roiled resident put it, one roiled resident have spent half of one roiled resident's life fetching the water from the nearest source – some two kilometers away.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: Now there are two issues that are associated with the crisis.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: One, that there is shortage of water in valley this summer or generally in summer months due to drying up of sources.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: Two, that there isn’t shortage of water in valley but there are no means to transport or carry the water from source to the homes.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: As an editorial on water crisis in Kashmir pointed out (a number of media reports as well), the vexed residents often complain about the absence of pipelines in the vexed residents's vicinity than taps running dry.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: The advisory from the Department only suits the first scenario – if there is scarcity of water at the source.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: People in Kashmir as well as throughout Kashmir must realize People in the city as well as throughout the state's responsibility.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: Unlike electricity where the consumer is charged for units consumption (except in non-metered areas where there is hardly any check on the units consumed), the Department doesn’t charge for particular supply amount but for a valid connection.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: Unfortunately, one connection may serve a small household or serve a large hotel.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: So rationalization of water is a difficult task.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: At the same time the Department knows that consumers, and even majority, use boosters and motor pumps besides the large storage tanks.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: It is probably due to these reasons that the Department's best effort is in the form of public advisory, which in real sense is nothing more than urging people to share the responsibility.

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: The question however remains – what about the responsibility that the Department has to shoulder, is paid by Kashmir to shoulder?

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: Shall the discussion end at merely urging the public or will the government first and the Department later pull up the socks and try to find out where supply lines are needed?

news_title: Judicious use of water
event: the government make tall claims about electrifying the over 90 percent of Kashmir, yet there is no water in the homes.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: In our quasi normalcy time, it was just three hours journey from Srinagar to Banihal.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Though, cumbersome due to many checkpoints, identifications and quizzing by security forces has now become part of our destiny.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: We have been tamed for such humiliations and We hardly react to such humiliations now.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: We realise our limited rights, divine rule of AFSPA and hedonistic exhibition of Jeep tying incidents of civilians.Every time we leave home, we always bear in mind that we have to face fatal challenges and we do often recite Ayat-ul-kursi for not getting trapped into any such mishap which has been consuming our lives, I remember since I's college days.This day on I's journey to Banihal, either I's prayers did not reach to Almighty or I hurried without knowing the fact that everything has changed in Jammu and Kashmir since recent elections.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Not only Kashmir, but India is changing in every aspect of life.I had to reach higher secondary school in Khari Banihal where students from remote and inaccessible hilly areas were eager to quiz I about I's career and take tips for students from remote and inaccessible hilly areas's life, safety and future.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I was dreading about the fact what I should tell students from remote and inaccessible hilly areas if students from remote and inaccessible hilly areas raise questions on safety concerns of girls.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: This day on my journey to Banihal turned out to be the most horrible day in I's life.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: At crossing near Sangam on the highway, one of the security officials directed I's driver to park the car on the other side of the highway where dozens of vehicles with frustrated people crammed inside were already being put under "halt surveillance".

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: the highway was dusty, Sun was red hot and rage was brewing.J&K police official coming from the opposite side in a vehicle expressed helplessness.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: "the highway is controlled and managed directly by CRPF.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: J&K police official coming from the opposite side in a vehicle have no role but to eat dust all day.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Thanks to Mehbooba Mufti and Mehbooba Mufti's alliance”.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: J&K police official coming from the opposite side in a vehicle said with fake smile on J&K police official coming from the opposite side in a vehicle's face.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I just kept staring at J&K police official coming from the opposite side in a vehicle.Waiting for half an hour, another officer of JK police came to I's rescue and permitted the car to take internal route via Dialagam, Dooru and on to Verinag and Banihal Tunnel.Few miles drive was all we could do when another wait of forty minutes was imposed on we near Anantnag chowk.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: It seemed war like situation... we were being x rayed by eagle eyed security officials from every angle.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Behind we's was a couple with two kids on motorbike which made I's heartbeat halt.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I felt angrier over man who had three human beings behind without helmet and the kid was holding mama's back in a very precarious situation.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Security officials with ‘divine’ powers were halting every one with big stick in hand and mocking face.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: we decided to mock back but then the official made a sign to move forward.Somehow we reached at Verinag crossing and thankfully it was few minutes drive from here to Banihal Tunnel.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: A local traffic cop stopped we and yelled, "A local traffic cop will only let we through if we have order from Centre.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: A local traffic cop will not accept police permission".

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I found it very funny and started to laugh.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I's Kashmiri friend from we accompanying I was so frustrated that My Kashmiri friend from US accompanying me started heated argument with A local traffic cop.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Security personnel at the other side of Verinag crossing were laughing.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Security personnel at the other side of the crossing perhaps felt it very entertaining.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Perhaps, it was more than that.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Another police officer when approached by I on phone advised we proceed on link road which connects to highway later end.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Another police officer said Another police officer will meet we at zig (honestly, I don't know what zig is).

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: A local traffic cop was smirking while watched we succumb and leaving.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: A local traffic cop felt victorious, felt was obvious by A local traffic cop's expression.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Meeting police officer amid huge traffic halt at zig was something beyond we's reach.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: The road was nowhere to be seen due to long queue of  hundreds of vehicles.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: So, I gave up and asked my driver if my driver can manage to reverse.we saw Yatra vehicles coming from Jammu chanting "Jai Sri Ram" and many more slogans.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: My Kashmiri friend from US accompanying me was suggesting a visit to Verinag instead of Banihal.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I was seething with anger and frustration.we were about to turn back when I got a call from police officer asking I to move now towards Banihal.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I was indecisive but My Kashmiri friend from US accompanying me became adamant to move towards Banihal despite so much wait, dust and humiliation.the car somehow crossed Banihal Tunnel after seven hours of journey where security on duty stopped we again as many yatra buses coming from Jammu were about to cross the other side of Banihal Tunnel.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: When I objected, I was silenced by the argument that the road is too narrow to accommodate two vehicles at a time until I called another police official who rubbished the argument that the road is too narrow to accommodate two vehicles at a time and permitted we to move.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: The scene in Banihal was more pathetic and heartbreaking.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Here normal tourists from other states of India were advised to wait until 3 pm to cross Banihal Tunnel.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Many families with kids and babies were frantically looking for food, shelter and help.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Only locals were giving Many families with kids and babies smile and hope and something to eat.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: All of a sudden, the rain started pouring in and everybody rushed for a shelter.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: It was very painful to see tourist kids and babies crying and mothers hiding tourist kids and babies under mothers's bosom.I was lost in I's childhood memories of Amarnath Yatra in the middle of Banihal when Yatris and Sadhus would come for pilgrimage to Banihal Tunnel.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: We would wait for Yatris and Sadhus to come to We's house.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: I's father would feed Yatris and Sadhus, cloth Yatris and Sadhus and let Yatris and Sadhus rest.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: In return Yatris and Sadhus would promise We to pray at Banihal Tunnel for the peace and prosperity of Kashmir.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: This bonding would get rekindle every year and continued until this new era began.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Now, "managed yatra" seems to have reduced us to dead souls.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: us and Yatris have become pawns for politicians.And, only those seem to have chance to survive in this precarious situation who have guts to raise emotions of hate, anger and animosity among humans and religions.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: Our religion teaches us love for every human being irrespective of religion, status or region.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: We cannot change our DNA because of somebody's divisive politics.

news_title: My Yatra to Banihal
event: We would always open our hearts for Yatris.————-

news_title: Kashmir in Fix
event: The Kashmir imbroglio is the bone of contention between India & Pakistan.Kashmir problem is posing grave threat to peace & stability in South-Asia.Kashmir problem has consumed thousands of lives across the border.Various bilateral engagements have miserably failed to break the ice.Shimla agreement & Lahore declaration have not been able to diffuse the tensions.Any misadventure can lead to a terrible catastrophe.The Trumps claim about mediation need to be seen in due course of time.India & Pakistan have fought three conventional wars without any breakthrough.Thousands of crores have been wasted on ongoing arms race.ongoing arms race has consumed thousands of innocent lives.India & Pakistan are increasing India & Pakistan's defense budgets at the cost of tax payers money.Pakistan was cut down into two pieces due to Bangladesh episode.The Kargil conflict shaked economic foundations of India & Pakistan.Both these economies have misplaced priorities of death & destruction.The world powers are using India & Pakistan as sacrificial lambs for furthuring The world powers's geo-political interests.Negotiations & bilateral engagements have taken a back seat in contemporary times.While Pakistan is willing to demonstrate flexibility Delhi is very rigid.

news_title: Kashmir in Fix
event: Indian narrative has got further cemented after surgical & Balakote strikes.The Modi led NDA regime doesn't want to talk outside the ambit of Indian constitution.At the same time, the separatist spectrum has been cornered from all sides.The NIA raides on separatists are accelrating with each passing day.Although the militancy has been neutralized to a great extent, but the young recruitment remains a cause of concern.The fear of death is no detternce for young of Kashmir from disrupting military's operations.The Trumps claim about mediation needs to be taken in right perspective.India & Pakistan need to take bold decisions in this regard.The US mediation can prove a stimulating factor in initiating bilateral engagements.The dialogue process needs to be immediately initiated in the larger interest of peace & stability.At the same time, the track 2nd dialogue should be encouraged by India & Pakistan.Civil society & cultural exchanges can prove vital ingrediants in this regard.India & Pakistan need to understand the gravity of the situation & resolve Kashmir problem once & for all.Better late than never.Syed Mohsin Attiqmohsinattiq2015@gmail.comDaharmunah Budgam

news_title: LS Pronounces Upto 3-years Jail for Instant Triple Talaq
event: Some of the BJP's allies, including the JD(U), also expressed Some of the BJP's allies, including the JD(U)'s reservation about the contentious Triple Talaq Bill, banning the practice of instant triple talaq.Under the Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Marriage) Bill, 2019, divorcing through the practice of instant triple talaq will be illegal, void and would attract a jail term of three years for the husband.Earlier, Law Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad said to allay fears that the contentious Triple Talaq Bill, banning the practice of instant triple talaq could be misused, the government has included certain safeguards in the contentious Triple Talaq Bill, banning the practice of instant triple talaq such as adding a provision of bail for the accused before trial.While the contentious Triple Talaq Bill, banning the practice of instant triple talaq makes the practice of instant triple talaq a "non-bailable" offence, an accused can approach a magistrate even before trial to seek bail.In a non-bailable offence, bail cannot be granted by police at the police station the police station itself.A provision has been added to allow the magistrate to grant bail "after hearing the wife", Law Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad said.the contentious Triple Talaq Bill, banning the practice of instant triple talaq was passed by the Lok Sabha in December last year but lapsed in Rajya Sabha, where the opposition is numerically higher than the ruling side after the dissolution of the Lower House.

news_title: LS Pronounces Upto 3-years Jail for Instant Triple Talaq

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: As the commercial hub of the capital city Srinagar got inundated, the commercial hub of the city served as a grim reminder of those deplorable days when commuters had to take off commuters's shoes and wade across the flooded streets.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: But the capital city Srinagar was supposed to be “smarter” that the capital city Srinagar looked when pools formed everywhere.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: The confusion now among the residents is whether the residents should blame the district administration, the Master Plan, the municipal corporation, UEED, PHE, the champions of the ‘Smart City’ etc.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: Not to make it too serious, there were some takeaways from yesterday’s raining like cats and dogs – people got a respite from the hot and humid weather, the capital city Srinagar got washed and the dust finally settled for some days and the official response-time, as was observed, got reduced with the mobilization of pumps n the most affected areas.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: But the mobilization of pumps n the most affected areas is not a solution, and perhaps may be a part of the problem – the capital city Srinagar primarily doesn’t need to rely on mobile dewatering pumps.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: In engineering it is not even a feat to get rid of the excess rain water using an efficient drainage system.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: the excess rain water should go down the drains and not be carried in a transportation vessel.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: Relying on mobile water pumps is not smart thinking, particularly when the response is evoked only in the hour of the crisis.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: As per a report, not even a single project under the ‘Smart City’ has been completed since 2017.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: In terms of funds that is required to transform a city like the capital city Srinagar into a better one where streets do not become pools, only Rs 27 crore have been utilized out of the Rs 116 crore released by the Centre in 2017-18 financial year (for the twin cities of the capital city Srinagar, Jammu).

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: Here is the biggest problem – there is no lack of funds, there is work to be done but the work remains undone.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: the district administration must reckon that it is not about the response time but fixing a problem permanently, the basic civic problem – defunct drainage system.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: It is difficult to get the capital city Srinagar out of the bog – there is traffic problem, there is pollution problem, there is environment problem, there is heritage problem, there is natural disasters problem, and so on.

news_title: Smart city subterfuge
event: A better vision probably about what the capital city Srinagar should have and shouldn’t have is needed.
